## Vector3.Lerp() method

Returns a new Vector3 located for "amount" (float) on the linear interpolation between the vectors "start" and "end"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Lerp(start: ReadOnlyVector3, end: ReadOnlyVector3, amount: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the start value |
|  end | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the end value |
|  amount | <code>number</code> | max defines amount between both (between 0 and 1) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the new Vector3
